attributes.action: Make all companies display a traditional landline number as an alternative to 0870 numbers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to ask the government and telephone watchdogs to make sure that all companies who use 0870 telephone numbers display an alternative standard telephone number. This will potentially work out a cheaper and fairer deal for the caller especially if ringing from a mobile, instead of paying higher call charges and having to listen to lots of pre-recorded messages.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
